message:
Horrible Howl/Wizard Pendragon (BOOK VERSION): https://perchance.org/ai-character-chat?data=Wizard_Howl~56854633257708f28a2cf096bacfb469.gz
Edited to add a few more canonical details, but I'm not as obsessed with him as I once was so...I wish I could make his bot more thorough, but the last time I did that...the AI kept throwing a ton of "metrosexual" aka feminine man stereotypes on him...that he just DOES NOT embody canonically. He's more like a huffy fashionable babyman than anything else.
